alert.note: Alert for Cobb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cobb and northeastern Fulton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 648 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Mount Bethel, or near Marietta, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Fair Oaks, Mount Bethel, Vinings, Dobbins Air Reserve Base and Chastain Memorial Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
